2.text: Pour the coffee into a blender along with MCT oil and butter.
2.vid: /d/dc/Make Butter or Bulletproof® Style Coffee Step 2.360p.mp4

3.text: Cover and blend the mixture for 20 to 30 seconds.
3.vid: /f/fb/Make Butter or Bulletproof® Style Coffee Step 3.360p.mp4

4.text: Pour the bulletproof-style coffee into a mug.

5.text: Use chai tea instead of coffee for a different flavor.
5.vid: /0/0e/Make Butter or Bulletproof® Style Coffee Step 5.360p.mp4

6.text: Substitute coconut oil for the MCT oil.
6.vid: /d/df/Make Butter or Bulletproof® Style Coffee Step 6.360p.mp4

7.text: Add collagen to make a thicker drink.
7.vid: /8/81/Make Butter or Bulletproof® Style Coffee Step 7.360p.mp4

8.text: Mix in mushroom powder for additional antioxidants.
8.vid: /1/1c/Make Butter or Bulletproof® Style Coffee Step 8.360p.mp4

9.text: Include cinnamon and salt for a spiced drink.
